pkgmetadata.longdescription: Utility Functions for Davidian Curves // A Davidian curve defines a seminonparametric density, whose flexibility can be tuned by a parameter. Since a special case of a Davidian curve is the standard normal density, Davidian curves can be used for relaxing normality assumption in statistical applications (Zhang Davidian, 2001) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.2001.00795.x. This package provides the density function, the gradient of the loglikelihood and a random generator for Davidian curves.
